pages.text: Appears in:$(li)Kamen Rider Zi-O (2018, TV show)$(br2)Used to access Decade's $(l:decade/riders/neo_decade#wizard)Wizard$(/l) form$(br2)Can be used to summon $(l:wizard/riders/wizard)Kamen Rider Wizard$(/l) when right-clicked as $(l:decade/riders/diend)Kamen Rider Diend$(/l) while having the $(l:decade/arsenal/neo_diendriver)Neo Diendriver$(/l) in your inventory
